mapper.select: SELECT name FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT email FROM users WHERE name = #{name} AND phone = #{phone}
SELECT id, email, name, phone, birth, reg_date, klg_renew_date, risk_renew_date, docu_renew_date FROM users WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (email, name, password, phone, birth, reg_date, klg_renew_date, risk_renew_date, docu_renew_date) VALUES(#{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{birth}, now(), now(), now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password = #{newPassword} WHERE email = #{email}
UPDATE users SET phone = #{phone} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE users SET user_klg = #{userKlg} WHERE email = #{email}
